snippet: Garth Fagan’s “From Before” was among the four works on the Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater program at City Center.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater's performance of Garth Fagan's piece From Before at City Center.
lead_paragraph: Garth Fagan’s “From Before” was among the four works on the Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater program at City Center.
